DOC.brief_summary: Glaucoma might be a mitochondria associated disease. Since citrate is a major component in mitochondrial metabolism its determination in blood might serve as a biomarker.
DOC.brief_title: Serum Citrate in Diagnosis and Follow-up for Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: age> 18 years glaucoma Active ocular inflammation Ocular Hypertension Nephropathy Alcohol, Drug abuse Mitochondriopathy
